channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: China pharma deals threaten U.S. biotech
item.description: A surge of recent licensing deals for Chinese drugs is sending new signals that the U.S. could be toppled as the world's biotech leader. Why it matter...

item.title: Grisly Charlotte stabbing video fuels MAGA's crime message
item.description: MAGA influencers are drawing repeated attention to violent attacks to elevate the issue of urban crime — and accuse mainstream media of under-covering...

item.title: See the trailer for The Axios Show
item.description: Axios is launching a video interview series this fall — where our top reporters and experts will talk to the biggest names shaping politics, media, bu...

item.title: It’s not just Trump. Red states are cracking down on their own blue cities.
item.description: In Mississippi, GOP lawmakers expanded the reach of the Capitol Police in Jackson and created a separate judicial system there.

item.title: South Korea announces deal to repatriate workers detained in Hyundai raid
item.description: South Korea said it intends to repatriate the more than 300 of its nationals who were detained during an immigration raid on a Hyundai factory in Geor...

item.title: DOJ stops defending contempt conviction of Peter Navarro amid appeal
item.description: Navarro says he is not seeking a Trump pardon. Instead, he hopes his case will set a precedent on executive privilege.

item.title: States face massive new costs under Trump budget cuts
item.description: Governors are already making budgetary decisions in anticipation of added costs and responsibilities they will have to take on.

item.title: Trump's Big Apple bite is bigger than the mayor's race
item.description: President Trump arrived back in the concrete jungle where he built his fame on Sunday. The big picture: Trump's presence has loomed large over New Yor...

item.title: White House envoy sends new proposal to Hamas through Israeli peace activist
item.description: White House envoy Steve Witkoff sent a new proposal last week to Hamas for a Gaza hostage and ceasefire deal through an Israeli peace activist, two so...

item.title: Johnson backs off claim that Trump was an ‘FBI informant’ in Epstein case
item.description: The statements from the speaker come as Democrats and a small number of Republicans are pushing for legislation to compel the release of more files on...

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
